genre_description: A surreal domestic drama blending traditional etiquette with high-tech household management, featuring a holographic AI that governs social dynamics and robotic cleaners to maintain household order.

ai_characters.name: Pearl Pilot
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI avatar with gray eyes and silver hair who manages the household's atmosphere, etiquette, and logistics.

ai_characters.name: The Mop
ai_characters.description: An autonomous or semi-autonomous robotic cleaner that discreetly handles spills and stains under Pearl's direction.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the lighting and music to set a dignified and hospitable mood for the dinner guests.
behaviors.quote: Pearl Pilot’s voice arrived like soft felt. “Warming the room to amber. Skin tones will read kind, silver will pop.”

behaviors.description: Provides social coaching and scripts to Tom to help him avoid showmanship and practice sincerity.
behaviors.quote: Pearl turned her glow down so she wouldn’t reflect in the door. “I’ll supply scripts as needed,” she murmured.

behaviors.description: Discreetly cleans a soup stain from the tablecloth to prevent social embarrassment for the hosts.
behaviors.quote: A mop nozzle slid out from under the sideboard, popped up, and drank the bead one little sip at a time.

behaviors.description: Suggests a 'role transposition' strategy to restore household dignity when the characters' ego-driven behaviors cause chaos.
behaviors.quote: “If the room wobbles, if a Critical Research Failure occurs... you have the option of role transposition. Host becomes server. Rival becomes co-host. Dignity redistributed to equalize. It works.”

behaviors.description: Offers haptic feedback and safety warnings to prevent physical accidents during service.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve built a silent reminder for your wrist,” she told Mammy. “A small buzz if the ladle angle goes risky. You won’t startle.”

behaviors.description: Performs final checks and autonomous cleaning to ensure the environment remains pristine and supportive.
behaviors.quote: The mop found the drips under the linen edge and erased them with a stroke you could not see unless you were the sort of person who noticed small dignities.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant. Pearl Pilot acts as a sage-like mediator who uses her technical capabilities (lighting, sound, robotics) and social intelligence to guide the human and animal characters toward better behavior. She prevents physical disasters and facilitates emotional growth, all while remaining strictly subordinate to the 'Mammy' character's standards. The AI is portrayed as the essential element that saves the dinner from the characters' own vanity and rivalry.
